spec_data.Name: perl-File-Tail
spec_data.Description:
The primary purpose of File::Tail is reading and analysing log files
while they are being written, which is especially useful if you are
monitoring the logging process with a tool like Tobias Oetiker's MRTG.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 08 Aug 2017 10:46:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension for reading from continously updated files
